page.title: 07HOLLY HOUSE FARM, NESSCLIFFE
page.content: Holly House Farm used to be a virtually derelict three storey property with outbuildings built out of local materials. For many years it was a thriving workplace but is now mainly residential. In the field which adjoins the old farmhouse is a pool of 0_178 hectares, this has been allowed to revert to its natural state and provides a secure wilderness and breeding ground for moorhens, ducks, geese, visiting swans and aquatic creatures also a wide variety of insect_life. We are a family of four and moved here from Alberbury.
